pkgmetadata.longdescription: Elimination-by-Aspects Models // Fitting and testing multi- attribute probabilistic choice models, especially the Bradley- Terry-Luce (BTL) model (Bradley Terry, 1952; Luce, 1959), elimination-by-aspects (EBA) models (Tversky, 1972), and preference tree (Pretree) models (Tversky Sattath, 1979).
